The report 'A Comprehensive Assessment of Water Management in
Agriculture' Comprehensive Assessment of Water Management in Agriculture.
2007. [http://www.iwmi.cgiar.org/assessment/ Water for Food, Water for Life, A
Comprehensive Assessment of Water Management in Agriculture]. London: Earthscan,
and Colombo: International Water Management Institute was published in
2007 by International Water Management Institute and Earthscan in an attempt to
answer the question: how can water in agriculture be developed and managed to
help end poverty and hunger, ensure environmentally sustainable practices, and
find the right balance between food and environmental security?
